alive_authors_available_books_england.map: function(doc) { if (doc.bookLabel && doc.authors && doc.authors.length > 0) { for (var i = 0; i < doc.authors.length; i++) { emit(doc.authors[i], { '_id': doc.authors[i], 'bookId': doc._id }); } } else if (doc.authorLabel && !doc.dod) { emit(doc._id, { 'authorLabel': doc.authorLabel }); } else if (doc.availability === 'Available' && doc.libraryId) { emit(doc.bookId, { '_id': doc.libraryId }); } else if (doc.country === 'England') { emit(doc._id, { 'libraryCountry': doc.country }); } }
